transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir good morning.
Customer: Very good morning.
Executive: Roshan baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise ho aap? Haan haan Roshan bhai aap theek ho?
Customer: Main badhiya sir aap kaise hain?
Executive: Haan haan shukr hai aapka.
Customer: Sir wo kaam ho gaya aapka ab chal raha hai?
Customer: Haan haan ab chal raha hai.
Executive: Dheere dheere speed badh raha hai lekin chal raha hai.
Executive: Koi nahi sir agar aisa fir se hua already matlab hamari taraf se confirmation aa gayi hai ki humne Jio ko complain wagera kara hua tha to waha se bhi wo sari cheeze detail aa gayi hai hamare paas mein.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To humne wo sari cheeze already kar diya hai to I hope ab aapko dikkat nahi hogi. Dikkat hogi to hamare aapke paas mein mera number hai WhatsApp hai aap mere ko ek baar WhatsApp pe bhi message kar doge na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To bhi hum usko look out kar lenge.
Customer: Koi issue nahi.
Executive: Right? To hum lage hue the.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Ji ji.
Executive: Fir bhi koi dikkat hogi sir in in future to aap mujhe please bataiyega.
Customer: Theek hai bhai koi issue nahi.
Executive: Mujhe sir do teen cheeze aur aapse discuss karni thi jaise bahut sara product aapne sir out of stock mark kar rakha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kashmiri saffron, Kushali saffron, organic honey.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Dried flowers.
Customer: Out of saffron humne humne usko hide karke rakha hai. Out of stock.
Executive: Kyu matlab ye sab mein deal nahi kar rahe ho abhi aap?
Customer: Nahi main abhi matlab kuch der ke liye baki cheezo mein thoda issue aa raha hai to isko hum hide karte hain fir hum khud hi unhide karte hain usko.
Executive: Achcha achcha matlab aapke hisab se aapko iske bare mein mat koi issue nahi.
Customer: Uska issue nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha to natural saffron saffron flower petal ye sab bhi aapne dal rakha hai.
Executive: To natural saffron wagera mein to deal kar rahe ho na ye to main product hai aapka.
Customer: Wo to rakhe hain humne.
Executive: Natural saffron aapne out of stock mark kar rakha hai sir.
Customer: Haan usko unhide kar dijiye.
Executive: Ek second line pe rukiyega.
Executive: Aur baki sir almond ki ek category hai jisme aap buylead purchase kar rahe ho lekin wo keyword aapke profile mein updated nahi hai.
Customer: Kaunsa wala?
Executive: Main aapko batata hu.
Executive: Almond ka category ek hai.
Executive: Ek keyword hai.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Executive: Ek flavored almond.
Customer: Nahi nahi flavored almond nahi hai hamare paas.
Executive: To isme aap deal nahi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Na na flavored nahi hai.
Executive: To aapne sir isme abhi teen char buylead consume kari hui hai aapne.
Customer: Maybe uske baad baad mein upar se lead aati hogi to niche us usme na jo description hoti hai na wo match karti hogi to isliye isliye usko ye consume kiya hoga.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan haan matlab usme aap abhi deal nahi kar rahe ho?
Customer: Na na flavored nahi main nahi kar rahe.
Executive: To ye wali keyword pe aapke profile mein update na karu?
Customer: Na na na zaruri nahi hai.
Executive: Chalo koi problem nahi hai sir ye update nahi karta hu aur sir kuch ek keyword hai jisme aap continuously purchase kar rahe ho lekin usme na do do ek ek category hi map hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To hum kuch aur products wagera badha sakte hain kya?
Customer: Kaunsa wala bata dijiye.
Executive: Ek second pehle ruko aap sabse pehle ek Kushali saffron mein rehne du ya hata du?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Kushali Kushali saffron mein abhi aap deal kar rahe ho? Kushali Kushali saffron nahi rakh li ye hata dijiye koi issue nahi.
Executive: Achcha aur baki honey mein to aap deal kar nahi rahe ho dried flower mein aap deal kar nahi rahe ho natural saffron mein?
Customer: Haan honey ka saffron rakh lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai natural saffron mein photo woto nahi dali hui hai aur saffron karke ek category hai usme bhi aapki photo nahi dali hui hai.
Customer: Haan hai kya kaunsa?
Executive: Berries mein deal karte ho sir aap?
Customer: Haan berries mein karte hain.
Executive: To berries ke photo wagera nahi dali hui hai abhi aapki.
Customer: Berries to alag alag berries hai na.
Executive: Total total sir 10 product hai jiska score kafi kam hai aur 15 product hai jiska description wagera aapne nahi dal rakha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ek bari ko ye keyword wagera ye profile aapko update karni padegi sir. Main main ek baar na laptop pe aaunga kuch der baad abhi busy hu to main aapko call kar lunga yahi se theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai jab bhi aap laptop pe aaye na ek baar ko hum pura online baith ke discuss karte hain jo bhi keywords hai jo bhi update hai is sari cheezo ko update karte hain. Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Bilkul bhai bilkul theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai meanwhile sir aapka ye concern jo chal raha tha isko aap close kar sakta hu sir?
Customer: Haan haan kar dijiye koi issue nahi.
Executive: Isko kar du na? Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: To aapke paas wo feedback ke liye jayega sir I am sorry jo bhi aapko disturbance hui hai. Koi issue nahi koi issue nahi.
Executive: Hai na to feedback ke liye jayega please aap feedback zarur share kijiyega. No issue no issue main karta hu.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir have a good day. Thank you bhai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's products marked as out of stock.

- Customer is purchasing buyleads for flavored almonds.

- Customer has not updated profile with keywords.

- Customer has not added photos for products.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the Jio complaint resolution.

- Executive offered WhatsApp support for issues.

- Executive informed about out-of-stock products.

- Executive offered to update profile keywords.

- Executive offered to discuss updates online.

- Executive will close the ongoing concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update profile after some time.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- out of stock, buyleads, profile update, saffron, almonds
